title: Kinect 2 Depth Ground Projection (Coded for ActiveMe) using Compute Shader and Job System
description: This project is the last Kinect project I did. It use compute shader and job system to compute the Kinect to projection calibration. I coded the application in two. One that deal with the Kinect and export the texture throw the memory ram of the computer to the other app to have a "60" fps flow.
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
